page.title: 03The Miners' Strike.
page.content: One Tuesday in 1984 my Dad went to work at Markham pit. About half an hour later he came back and said to my mum, "We're on strike". My dad only got a little bit of money from the Social Security. We could not watch T.V. alot because of the electricity bill. Dad took our dog on long walks for something to do as he was on strike for over eleven months. He could not go to the pub a lot , nor smoke as he hadn't enough money. Each morning my Dad would go and join the picket line and earn Â£1 a week plus the petrol money for taking the other pickets to Orgreave Coking Plant, so we had Â£10 a week. My Dad went to the Strike Centre each morning for breakfast. There wasn't much money for Christmas presents but it was the best Christmas Iv'e ever had.
